scenes.description: Fan message showcase featuring supportive illustrations and comments for Mori Calliope's 2nd concert.
Pre-concert waiting screen with event rules and social media guidelines.
Audience attention slide regarding flashing lights and cheering rules.
Promotional showcase for the 'Grimoire' 2nd Round of Concert Merchandise.
Second sequence of fan messages and support art from the global community.
Return to the pre-concert waiting screen and informational slides loop.

subtitles.original: ライブが素晴らしいものになりますように！！
subtitles.english: I hope the concert is wonderful!!

subtitles.original: 頑張れカリオペ～！！
subtitles.english: Do your best, Calliope~!!

subtitles.original: ライブ開催 おめでとう、Calli!!
subtitles.english: Congratulations on the concert, Calli!!

subtitles.original: きっと人生で最高の日になると信じてます！
subtitles.english: I believe it will be the best day of your life!

subtitles.original: カリオペ〜〜〜！！！ 大好きだーーー！！！
subtitles.english: Calliope!!! I love you!!!

subtitles.original: 2ndライブ開催おめでとうございます！！
subtitles.english: Congratulations on holding the 2nd live!!

subtitles.original: 日本からも応援しているよー！！！
subtitles.english: I'm supporting you from Japan too!!!

subtitles.original: LAでの2ndライブ開催おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Congratulations on holding the 2nd live in LA!

subtitles.original: 全力で楽しんでね！！
subtitles.english: Please enjoy it to the fullest!!

subtitles.original: The concert will be starting soon.
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: Attention For Visitors
subtitles.english: Attention For Visitors

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上、明滅の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.

subtitles.original: 声出しの応援 OKです
subtitles.english: Cheering loudly is OK

subtitles.original: 2nd Round of Concert Merch
subtitles.english: 2nd Round of Concert Merch

subtitles.original: 待ちに待った2ndライブ！ 楽しんでいこー！！
subtitles.english: The long-awaited 2nd live! Let's have fun!!

subtitles.original: 2ndライブ開催おめでとう！！ 日本からも応援してるよ！
subtitles.english: Congratulations on the 2nd live!! Supporting from Japan!

subtitles.original: ステージの上で輝く君をしっかりと目に焼き付けるよ！
subtitles.english: I'll burn the image of you shining on stage into my eyes!

subtitles.original: カリオペ最高！！ 応援してるよ！！
subtitles.english: Calliope is the best!! I'm supporting you!!

subtitles.original: 今からライブが楽しみ！！ 盛り上がっていこー！！
subtitles.english: Looking forward to the live!! Let's get hyped!!

subtitles.original: 頑張れカリオペ！！
subtitles.english: Do your best, Calliope!!

subtitles.original: 最高のステージになりますように！
subtitles.english: I hope it will be the best stage ever!
